revised_title: Anniversaries of Foreign Academies and Societies: Celebrating the 200th Anniversary of the Academy of Sciences of the U.S.S.R.

tldr: The article discusses the 200th anniversary celebration of the Academy of Sciences of the U.S.S.R., attended by a delegation from the Royal Society. It highlights the historical connection between the two organizations and their commitment to international scientific collaboration. The article also mentions the bicentenary of the American Philosophical Society, attended by the Royal Society.
